The only reason I am commenting is because I finally figured out why Dr. Cox was bald. Although we probably all realized it at the same time this week Dr. Cox is bald because he has Raynaud's syndrome. If you look carefully every time he is disgusted, annoyed, or stressed you will see his finger tips go white. The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, the crew are found in an area with spikes with feeding tubes going all over the place and capturing the crew immediately, saving two of them and trapping the last two under the spikes.
The characters are all believable as well, they are not stereotypical, and once you finish with the novel you find yourself wanting the sequel now
